text: About 82,849 children in age group of 0-5 would be administered the oral polio vaccine during the Pulse Polio campaign in the city on Sunday. The vaccine will be administered through 230 centres and about 1,150 government employees and volunteers will be deployed to carry out the exercise. Special arrangements have been made to administer the drops to children in places of public congregation such as bus stands, railway stations and the airport. Mobile teams will administer the vaccine to children of migrant labourers, the release added.
title: 82,849 children to get polio vaccine
